data.description:
Overview


Keysight is on the forefront of technology innovation, delivering breakthroughs and trusted insights in electronic design, simulation, prototyping, test, manufacturing, and optimization. Our ~15,000 employees create world-class solutions in communications, 5G and 6G, automotive, energy, quantum, aerospace, defense, and semiconductor markets for customers in over 100 countries. Learn more about what we do.

 

Our award-winning culture embraces a bold vision of where technology can take us and a passion for tackling challenging problems with industry-first solutions. We believe that when people feel a sense of belonging, they can be more creative, innovative, and thrive at all points in their careers.

 

Our EDA Business Operations team supports Keysight’s Design Engineering Software solutions (DES) organization empowering engineers and innovators to accelerate product development using advanced electronic design automation (EDA) and computer-aided engineering (CAE) tools.  

 


Responsibilities


We are seeking a highly motivated Business Analytics Intern to join our EDA Business Operations team. This role offers a unique opportunity to gain real-world experience at the intersection of data analytics, business strategy, and technology innovation. You will work closely with other EDA data scientists to transform complex data into actionable insights by providing software centric reporting and dashboard designs that drive strategic knowledge around growth and customer success.

 

What You’ll Gain

  • Hands-on experience with real-world business analytic projects in a leading technology company.
  • Exposure to strategic decision-making in an EDA software domain.
  • Mentorship from experienced professionals in business development and data analytics.
  • Experience presenting findings to senior leadership

 

Key Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather, analyze, and visualize data related to orders, revenue, product adoption, and software market trends.
  • Build and maintain dashboards and reports using Tableau, Snowflake, Salesforce, Excel, SQL, Python and more.
  • Assist in developing KPIs and metrics to track business performance across EDA initiatives.
  • Support ad hoc data analysis requests to inform strategic planning and executive presentations.
  • Help automate data workflows and improve data quality and accessibility.
  • Develop predictive models for division and forecasting

Qualifications


Required:

  • Currently pursuing a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Data Science, Business Analytics, Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • Strong analytical skills and proficiency in SQL, Excel, and data visualization.
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills.
  • Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.

Preferred:

  • Previous experience working with Tableau applications (Prep, Desktop, Cloud/Server)
  • Familiarity with Python or R for data analysis is a plus.
  • Interest or experience in the EDA industry, semiconductor design, or electronic test and measurement.
  • Exposure to CRM or ERP systems (e.g., Salesforce, SAP).
  • Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure) and data warehousing tools.

General Requirements:

  • Must be enrolled in an accredited college/university
  • Strong command of English (written and spoken)
  • Self-motivated, proactive, and eager to learn in a fast-paced environment
  • Visa sponsorship is not available for this position

Candidates who wish to be considered must be enrolled in a accredited college/university as of September 2026. Applicants who have graduated before September 2026 will not be considered unless they are entering/applying to a MS or PHD program after graduating.

 

Visa Sponsorship is not available for this position. Candidates who now or at any point in the future require sponsorship for employment visa status (e.g., H-1B Visa status) may not be considered.

 

Keysight Technologies Inc. is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other protected categories under all applicable laws.

 

The level of role will be based on applicable experience, education and skills; Most offers will be between the minimum and the midpoint of the Salary Range listed below.

 

California pay range: MIN $33.60-$36.18/hour

 

Note: For other locations, pay ranges will vary by region.

 

Careers Privacy Statement***Keysight is an Equal Opportunity Employer.***
